description.ko: 백색광이 유리 프리즘을 통해 선명한 무지개색으로 분산되는 찰나의 순간을 포착한 빛의 물리 현상의 우아한 시각화입니다.
description.en: An elegant visualization of light physics, capturing the precise moment white light breaks into a vibrant array of colors through a glass prism.

prompt: A macro shot of a sleek, triangular crystal prism resting on a dark reflective surface. A single sharp beam of white light enters the glass and disperses into a brilliant, wide-angled rainbow spectrum. The scene features soft caustic patterns, elegant lens flares, and hyper-realistic glass textures. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, sharp focus on the refraction point.
